official-title.#text:
To provide for the assignment of Sexual Assault Nurse
		  Examiners-Adult/Adolescent to brigades and equivalent units of the Armed
		  Forces.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Sexual Assault Nurse Examiner
			 Deployment Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 584 of the National Defense
			 Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:c, d
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:d, e
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:b
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:c

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
. The Secretary of the military department concerned may assign
				additional Sexual Assault Nurse Examiners-Adult/Adolescent as necessary based
				on the demographics or needs of a military unit. The Secretary of the military
				department concerned may waive the assignment requirement for a specific unit
				level if that Secretary determines that compliance will impose an undue burden,
				except that the Secretary shall notify

of each waiver and explain how
				compliance would impose an undue burden.

text.#text:
The Secretary of
				each military department shall assign at least one Sexual Assault Nurse
				Examiner-Adult/Adolescent to each brigade or equivalent unit level of each
				armed force under the jurisdiction of that Secretary unless assignment to other
				units is determined to be more practicable and effective by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
through the assignment of additional personnel to a
				unit or by assigning the duties of a Sexual Assault Nurse
				Examiner-Adult/Adolescent to current personnel of the unit, so long as such
				personnel meet the training and certification requirements of
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:c/p:1
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:d

text.#text:
On and after October
				1, 2015, only members of the armed forces and civilian employees of the
				Department of Defense may be assigned to duty as a Sexual Assault Nurse
				Examiner-Adult/Adolescent. The Secretary of the military department concerned
				may satisfy

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:d
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:a/p:1
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:d/p:1

quote.#text:
assigned under subsection (a) and Sexual Assault Victim
			 Advocates assigned under subsection (b)

, Sexual
			 Assault Victim Advocates, and Sexual Assault Nurse Examiners-Adult/Adolescent
			 assigned under this section

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
,
			 by adding at the end the following new sentence:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:d/p:2

quote.#text:
In the case of the
			 curriculum and other components of the program for certification of Sexual
			 Assault Nurse Examiners-Adult/Adolescent, the Secretary of Defense shall
			 consult with the Commission for Forensic Nursing Certification.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, by adding at the end the
			 following new sentence:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:d/p:3

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, the member or employee must
			 have completed the training program required by
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:c
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012/s:584/ss:d/p:1

quote.#text:
On and after October 1, 2015, before a member or
			 civilian employee may be assigned to duty as a Sexual Assault Nurse
			 Examiner-Adult/Adolescent under

text.#text:
The heading of such section is amended to read as
			 follows:

header.#text:
Sexual Assault
				Response Coordinators, Sexual Assault Victim Advocates, and Sexual Assault
				Nurse
				Examiners-Adult/Adolescent
